headline: 1 Unpopular Stock that Deserves a Second Chance and 2 to Ignore
summary: Wall Street’s bearish price targets for the stocks in this article signal serious concerns. Such forecasts are uncommon in an industry where maintaining cordial corporate relationships often trumps delivering the hard truth.

headline: The London Company Income Equity Vs. Russell 1000 Value Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: The London Company Income Equity portfolio returned 4.6% during the quarter vs. a 2.1% increase in the Russell 1000 Value Index.
